title: The Farmer’s Coin feat. Jin Ha and Greta Jung
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In part two of our summer series with the Boston Symphony Orchestra, Jin Ha (Devs, Love Life) and Greta Jung (Modern Family, Station 19) headline a Korean folktale about a hardworking farmer whose generosity brings a surprising reward.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: The Farmer’s Coin feat. Jin Ha and Greta Jung
